mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_dish_tables ( id, weid, storeid, limit_price, title, room_id, user_count, qrcodeid, displayorder, dateline, status, crter, crtdate, opter, optdate, deleted ) VALUES ( replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{weid}, #{storeid}, #{limit_price}, #{title}, #{room_id}, #{user_count}, #{qrcodeid}, #{displayorder}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sysdate()), #{status}, #{crter}, sysdate(), #{opter}, sysdate(), 0 )
INSERT INTO wx_dish_room ( id, rname, sid, crter, crtdate, opter, optdate, deleted ) VALUES ( replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{room_name}, #{storeid}, #{crter}, sysdate(), #{opter}, sysdate(), 0 )
mapper.select:
select room.id room_id, room.rname room_name, (select count(1) from wx_dish_tables tab where tab.room_id = room.id and tab.deleted = 0) tabnum from wx_dish_room room where room.deleted = 0 and room.sid = #{storeid}
and room.rname = #{room_name}
mapper.update: update wx_dish_tables set room_id = '' where room_id = #{room_id}
